string.name: about_clg
string.b: "Zajil is a significant provider of information and communications technology (ICT) services in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region. For more than 30 years, Zajil has served worldwide enterprises as Kuwait first Internet Service Provider and the regions top connectivity (MPLS) Service Provider. Our principal strength is the worldwide network, which includes 30+ fully owned and controlled POPs across the MENA and European regions, as well as protracted investments in cable infrastructure. "

string.name: about_clg2
string.b: "Zajil's never-ending quest to deliver the most cutting-edge technology and services to its clients in the area has positioned it as a regional leader in cloud services and security services. Our extensive variety of cloud services demonstrates the capacity to fulfil Zajil's aim of being the most relevant and important service provider for its customers."
